name: .DMP File Extension
summary: Learn about .DMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DMP file is a file that contains data "dumped" from a program's memory space. It is often created when a program has an error or crashes and may also be saved by the program "Savedump.exe" on the first reboot after a crash. DMP files are usually named "Memory.dmp."

content: Windows memory dump files may be used for troubleshooting system errors and other problems. However, they can take up a significant amount of space and may often be deleted.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
